params.groupSql: select distinct g.id, g.parentGroupId as parentId, g.groupname as groupName, g.seqNo as seqNo, g.description from tbl_group g where g.id=:groupId
params.userSql: select distinct u.id, g.id as groupId, u.loginName, u.userName,u.password, null as sex,null as birthday, null as employeeNo,gu.userorder as userOrder from tbl_group g, tbl_groupuser gu, tbl_user u where g.id = gu.groupid and gu.userid=u.id and g.id=:groupId
params.singleUser: select distinct u.id, null as groupId, u.loginName, u.userName, u.password, u.sex, u.birthday, u.employeeNo from tbl_user u where u.id = :userId
